document.masterDocTitle: Amphipod crustaceans (Corophiidea and Gammaridea) associated with holdfasts of Macrocystis pyrifera from the Beagle Channel (Argentina) and additional records from the Southwestern Atlantic

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Amphipod crustaceans (Corophiidea and Gammaridea) associated with holdfasts of Macrocystis pyrifera from the Beagle Channel (Argentina) and additional records from the Southwestern Atlantic

,

: 1 ♂ 4.95 mm , (damaged), MACN-In 38445a; 2 ovig. ♀♀ 10.2 and 11.15 mm , 2 ♀♀ 6.1 and 6.2 mm , 1 ♂ 6.8 mm , MACN-In 38445b; 1 ovig. ♀ 13 mm , 1 ♂ 10 mm , MACN-In 38445c; 2 ovig. ♀♀ 9 and 10.1 mm , 1 ♂ 9 mm , MACN-In 38445d. Same location, same colls.,

.

Shinkai Maru survey IV; sta. 33,
42 ◦ 30 ′ S
,
59 ◦ 28 ′ W
, 102 m depth, 23 July 1978 : HOLOTYPE , ♂ 8 mm , MACN-In 33447; ALLOTYPE , ♀ 10 mm , MACN-In 33448; PARATYPE , ♀ 6 mm , MACN-In 33449.

This new record of
Lembos argentinensis Alonso de Pina, 1992
widens its latitudinal distribution to the Beagle Channel. Its association with
M. pyrifera
holdfasts is mentioned for the first time.
